resources.string: This is the first attraction. It is an exhibit that is very interesting.
This is the second attraction. It is an exhibit that is very interesting.
This is the third attraction. Talking about it a lot is something that may or may not be difficult using the android String variable.
If you are lost or don\'t know where to go, press here to bring up a map.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc ut ante mi. Integer quis sagittis dui, quis interdum tortor. Praesent tincidunt vestibulum ullamcorper. This is some help text. It will tell you all you need to know about the various things that you will need to know, and may also give you some ability to contact the tour guide if you get lost or have any other issues.

 http://www.police.tas.gov.au/ 
 000 
 131 444

string-array.name: small_desc
string-array.item: The help desk where students may go for more information
The corridor where the computer labs are situated
The video conference room where most of the lectures at the university take place
The student lounge where many students gather
The corridor with the post graduate offices

string-array.name: large_desc
string-array.item: The shrine of Andrew (Praise be upon him).
A fantasy land that few will ever get access to.
Where you will spend most of your uni career slowly dying.
The place that will never fucking work.
The only place of solace in this dark world.
I bet you can\'t even name anyone who has an office down here.
